title: Radical Orthodoxy and Its Intersection with Jordan Peterson, Owen Barfield and Tom Holland
description:
Apologies for the hiccups on screen sharing and the sound on the clips.
Persevere. It's worth it.

Michael's interest in Owen Barfield has led him to discover the works of John Milbank and Catherine Pickstock, the founders of the Radical Orthodoxy movement. 
I apologize for the sound on the video clips. I'll try to get that fixed for future videos.
Radical Orthodoxy interviews with Pickstock and Milbank at 7:45
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-6QnEMH8K-c&t=1385s

Jordan Peterson at Melbourne, Australia in 2019:
Start at 1:47:00. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dPv1RYsi7sA

Milbank's book:  Theology & Social Theory - Beyond Secular Reason
